name: GuardTalkNoPermission
_source: s;Simon;Lord Verstadt, passing through to enter the king's demesne.
s;SoldierBlue;Sorry sir, but the king has declared a halt order for all entrants.
s;Simon;Indeed, but as a lord, I should be exempted.
s;SoldierBlue;There are no exceptions, I'm afraid.|This is the king's declaration.
s;Simon;But...{w} the king owes aid to his lords!
s;SoldierBlue;It isn't my decision, "sir". Now please step back.
s;Simon;This is outrageous!{w} My father would have never been treated like this.
s;Luther;Perhaps not, but your father's time has passed, milord.|It seems that we cannot rely on the king for any aid.|We must continue to put our faith in Lord Morrissey.
